column4: Can't locate LWP/Socket.pm in @INC (@INC contains: /etc/perl /usr/local/lib/perl/5.10.1 /usr/local/share/perl/5.10.1 /usr/lib/perl5 /usr/share/perl5 /usr/lib/perl/5.10 /usr/share/perl/5.10 /usr/local/lib/site_perl . Modules)
search with "apt-file" which package contains the Socket.pm and install it
how ican put hte command apt-file search ?
sudo apt-get install apt-file && sudo apt-file update after that you can search all packages containf the file "foo" with "sudo apt-file search foo"
